vault_aws_auth_backend_role_tag.description: Reads role tags from a Vault AWS auth backend.

role.description: The name of the AWS auth backend role to read

backend.description: The path to the AWS auth backend to

policies.description: The policies to be associated with the tag. Must be a subset of the policies associated with the role.

max_ttl.description: The maximum TTL of the tokens issued using this role.

instance_id.description: Instance ID for which this tag is intended for. If set, the created tag can only be used by the instance with the given ID.

allow_instance_migration.description: If set, allows migration of the underlying instances where the client resides. Use with caution.

disallow_reauthentication.description: If set, only allows a single token to be granted per instance ID.

tag_key.description: The key of the role tag.

tag_value.description: The value to set the role key.
